General.Name: Tianneng Battery Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Tianneng Battery Group Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of electric special vehicle power batteries, start-stop batteries for vehicles, 3c batteries, backup batteries, and energy storage batteries. The company offers lead-acid and lithium-ion power, traction, industrial backup, electric and mobile energy storage, starter, start-stop, on and off-grid, grid-connected, smart microgrid, and composite energy storage batteries. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Changxing, China. Tianneng Battery Group Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Tianneng Power International Limited.
